snippet: In this new video, the unorthodox French Canadian culinary pioneer reflects on his fondness for his wife, the borough of Queens and cooking veal brains for customers.
abstract: In this new video, the unorthodox French Canadian culinary pioneer reflects on his fondness for his wife, the borough of Queens and cooking veal brains for customers.

headline.main: What Made Me | Hugue Dufour, Head Chef at M. Wells Dinette and M. Wells Steakhouse
